Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This unique offering holds immense value for us, representing years of innovation and dedication to quality. We believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs or aspirations. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1200000. We are confident that this investment would not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
